Author: Assterisque
Text: Dude don't. They are just one person who has done what a bunch of us have; lied about how they "succeeded". This person is likely a part of us, that doesn't mean everyone who says they found a healthy way to lose is a liar.  I think I saw a discussion earlier about /isplenty and their weird asses still not (mostly) being disordered even though their behaviors can mimic those of a disordered person's.  We are all individuals, after all. You should keep fighting the good fight. The confession was not a sign, it was a person admitting to a few of their faults.  Sorry for the rant, but you deserve better.

Author: oh-em-jizzles
Text: :(. do u mind PMing me the acct? i'm curious. i'm sorry you're feeling this way, i wish i had anything helpful to say other than ur not alone :/
